DynamicPage.Title: Genesis Studio
DynamicPage.Content:
Jonathan Cisneros has written a nice WinForm-based IDE for [[AjGenesis]].
[[image:http://www.ajlopez.com/images/articles/genesisstudio03.png]]
More about the IDE:
[[http://ajlopez.wordpress.com/2007/12/24/genesis-studio-an-ide-for-ajgenesis/|Genesis Studio: an AjGenesis IDE]]
[[http://msmvps.com/blogs/lopez/archive/2007/12/24/genesis-studio-una-ide-para-ajgenesis.aspx|Genesis Studio: una IDE para AjGenesis]] (Spanish)
You can download from the files section on [[http://groups.google.com/group/codegeneration?hl=es|Code Generation Google Group]]. In short, it will be available in a separate CodePlex project.
